column4: where can I get plug ins for the media player to play mpeg and avi files?

anyone know wher to find the gstreamer plugins; i am having the hardest time locating them using the Synaptic Package Manager; I added the universe and multverse repositories yet I cant find them in there
search for the name "gstreamer" in synaptic
the names are for example "gstreamer0.10-plugins-bad" etc
